Trent: “As a kid I always said that my dream was to play in a game with Stevie." I thought that chance had passed to be honest."

Trent: "I know it wasn’t a competitive game but I’ll take it. It was brilliant to have him as a teammate & I’ll tick that one off my list."

Trent: "That iconic pass Stevie does - I used to watch that week in week out. To be on the receiving end of a couple was a privilege."

Trent: "Every kid growing up in Liverpool tried to emulate that kind of Steven Gerrard pass. He’s given me some great advice this season."

Trent: "He said he’s always there for me if I need to ask him anything. He’s such an important figure and has a vital role at the club now."

Trent: “I don’t think you’ll find anyone at the Academy who doesn’t look up to Gerrard. He’s the perfect role model, on and off the pitch."

Trent: "To have him in a full-time role at Kirkby is incredible for the Academy and I can only see more success coming from there."

亞古路在阿根廷電台訪問中表示將會在和曼城的合約結束後回到他15歲時已經獲得一隊上陣機會的青訓球會獨立隊，雖然訪問中他說自己在2018世界盃後就會完成合約回歸阿根廷，但據球會所指亞古路的合約是直至2019年，看來有些出入，但具體上完成合約後就準備回家的理念是沒有錯的，曼城方面近來也一直想要找亞古路續約多一年，但暫時看來進展不太順利。


亞古路在訪問中表示曼城方面亦很明白他想要回到家鄉作賽的想法，所以他亦承諾離開曼城後只會直接重返母會效力，讓曼城可放心他不會跑到敵對勢力去。
